name: web-doom-monorepo
description: DOOM ported to web with TypeScript

scripts.build: bun run build:libs && bun run build:pages
scripts.build:libs: bun run --filter @web-doom/wad build && bun run --filter @web-doom/core build && bun run --filter @web-doom/wad-viewer build
scripts.typecheck: tsgo --noEmit -p packages/wad && tsgo --noEmit -p packages/web-doom && tsgo --noEmit -p packages/wad-viewer && tsgo --noEmit -p packages/pages
